description: Mobile techniques used by Interconnection Filtering, ATT&CK mitigation M1014 (v1.0)
name: Interconnection Filtering (M1014)

techniques.comment: Filtering requests by checking request origin information may provide some defense against spurious operators.(Citation: CSRIC5-WG10-FinalReport)
